author: Staff Reporter
text:
Bodies of a 21-year-old woman and her one-and-half-year old son were found dead in a farm well at Rayakottai on Tuesday.

The victim Pramila, was married for the last three years Satish (31) of Veppalampatty at Rayakottai.

According to the police, Pramila went to the farm with her son Karthikeyan after Satish had left for work.The mother and son had not returned. On Monday night, the body of Karthieyan was found in the well, but Pramila’s body was not found until then. On Tuesday morning, Pramila’s body was found afloat. Police recovered the bodies and sent them for post-mortem. The reason for the deaths could not be ascertained.
title: Woman, child found dead in well
